Name: Cosmogroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One for lovers of bittersweet flavours.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered on DrinkBoy.com in February 2008.
Nutrition: One serving of Cosmogroni contains 138 calories
